website_summaries.verdict: An oversized helmet that's great for a serious commuter who faces heavy traffic daily.
pros: U.S. CPSC safety standard tested and approved
Classic skate design helmet with 11 vents and 2 sets of interchangeable pads
Fully formed ABS shell surrounds high-quality EPS foam to ensure safety on impact
Comes in several sizes, in a variety of matte colors
cons: Large and a bit heavy, but a helmet this protective can't be small

customer_reviews.title: This helmet saved my wife.
customer_reviews.text: Your helmet saved my wife's life. She was involved in a accident on a bike were a vehicle traveling @ 50+mph struck her from behind and ejected her 40 feet. She did receive a traumatic brain injury from the incident, but she has made good recovery and continues to do so. If it were not for your helmet God only knows how much injury her head would have sustained. Thank you so much for selling this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo A.

customer_reviews.title: SAVED MY MELON
customer_reviews.text: I would give this helmet 50 stars if i could. I was riding my bike on side walk. There was a tree limb hanging over side walk. I ducked a bit to avoid the limb and was clotheslined by a power pole support cable. The cable hit me across side of helmet knocking me backwards off bike. I landed on me hip and the back of my head whipped back and hit side walk extremely hard.i walked away without even a concussion. Had a bit of head ache that night and that was all. This helment did its job extremely well. More than satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Buford Allen Crumpton Jr

customer_reviews.title: Either That's a Big Helmet or You Have an Enormous Head
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I've lived most of my life being teased for the (large) size of my head. I like the look of this helmet, but thought that it was going to be much lower profile than it truly is. The following exchange with a co-worker summarizes this perfectly. Co-Worker (while helmet was sitting on my desk at work): Is that your helmet for your scooter? Me: Yeah. Co-Worker: That's really cool. I like it. Me (as I'm putting the helmet on): Thanks. Co-Worker (after seeing me with the helmet on): I retract what I just said about the helmet. Me/Co-Worker: Laughed hysterically. In short, this helmet is big and does not hug the head closely...but maybe it's just my huge head!
customer_reviews.author: S. Rankin

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: This helmet arrived on time and it was packaged very well. It came with extra padding, but little adjustment was needed for a proper fit. It looks great and it feels comfortable. I would definitely recommend it! Keep in mind that it’s still a soft, plastic texture. There is no actual bamboo, it’s just a simulated finish. It’s rated for use with biking and skating, so it’s exactly what I needed. Don’t hesitate if you’re interested! It’s a great helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Bad Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Looks great online - somewhat less attractive on my noggin
customer_reviews.text: Bought this helmet thinking I'd look cool... Especially cause it looks kinda cool, simple and spartan. But wow, in the large size, this is one unattractive helmet once on my head. That said, it has a ton of padding, is EXTREMELY thick and likely will be very protective in the event of a crash. But an ugly, large, uncomfortable helmet is less likely to be worn... so ...time to get another helmet for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Nice helmet
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Be sure to measure your head to pick the size, as the helmet is very snug and would be uncomfortable in the wrong size.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Nice helmet- runs small
customer_reviews.text: Good solid but lightweight helmet. Only one thing keeps it from 5 stars- SIZING. I ordered the L which is supposed to be 23.25”-24.75”, (58cm-63cm). My big melon measures at 23.5” (60cm) which is right there in the middle of the size range. I can get it on, but it squeezes so hard I am afraid to sneeze lest my eyes pop out! I was going to return it, but it fits my daughter perfectly. She’s 16 years old and measured 22.5” around her cranial bucket
customer_reviews.author: Steve S

customer_reviews.title: This Helmet Is so huge
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is so huge it makes you look like a bobblehead doll.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio Ferreira

customer_reviews.title: Very happy, fit was perfect. Thank you Retrospec for a quality product at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. Measured my head, ordered the large as indicated. Changed the padding with the thicker one provided and it is super comfortable. The sizing is perfect in my opinion. I like the fact that it wraps around my head leaving less skin exposed all the way around. Feels more like a helmet rather than a frisbee sitting on top of my head like helmets I have purchased in the past. This is my fourth helmet over 20 years and by far the best I have ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: AZshopper

customer_reviews.title: Fits good
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet. I use it for skateboarding and biking. Also used it for snowboarding once and works ok.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge de Leon

customer_reviews.title: Big heads move on
customer_reviews.text: Sharp helmet that's nice but did not fit as advertised. While it will fit a 24.25" head it does so very very snugly and uncomfortably. Instead of returning I will donate to Goodwill but be warned fellow ginormous head friends.
customer_reviews.author: rachael

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 of these and both came with dents on interior foam. These are heavy on the head and squished my temples. The large didn't really fit well in the front and back of my head because there was too much room. I ordered the same one but the CM-2 version and those fit great around the circumference of my head after I switched out the default pads. The CM-2 is also a bit more lightweight and modern looking in my opinion. Cute pastel pink color.
customer_reviews.author: Nommysushi

customer_reviews.title: Huge.  Really dorky looking
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is so huge it makes you look like a bobblehead doll. I returned it because I knew I would never wear it. I am sure it is very good functionally, it would have to be since it is so big. But, you will look like a dork wearing it. I wish they had a picture of a person wearing it in the photos. It would have been obvious
customer_reviews.author: JGravely

customer_reviews.title: Large
customer_reviews.text: I can’t speak for this helmut’s safety or functionality because I returned it due to it being really big in weird way. The helmet fit my head comfortably snug but the exterior shell was so big I looked like toad from Super Mario Bros. It looked big out of the box but cartoonish on. Maybe it was the white color, I don’t know.
customer_reviews.author: Victorianna M.

customer_reviews.title: Protective helmet with some drawbacks.
customer_reviews.text: I have good and bad things to say about this helmet: Pros -- Comfortable and plenty of protection. This helmet is THICC. Cons -- This helmet is TOOOOO THICC. On my head it looks way too big and bulky. The pictures look great but the helmet does not look so good on the head. In addition to this, the paint on it is poor quality. I put this in the back seat of my car after receiving it and when I got home it already had a scratch or 2 on it. There was nothing in my back seat.
customer_reviews.author: BDKilla

customer_reviews.title: Sits very high on the head. And heavy!
customer_reviews.text: This helmet feels sturdy, but it also weighs quite a bit. It's probably normal for helmets in this price range, but it's just too much for me. It also sits very high on my head. I don't think I have a particularly pointy head or anything, but this helmet makes me look like a mushroom. It's so high that I feel like my forehead and the sides of my head feel too exposed for comfort. I'm sure I'd have no problem surviving a brick being dropped from directly overhead, though. Overall, the comfort level is low. I'm not a big fan and will be seeking another helmet, even if at a higher price.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Fits my large head.
customer_reviews.text: Came with two sets of pads, I wear a large motorcycle helmet and bought the large bicycle helmet. Thankfully it came with two sets of pads and I used the larger set to get a good fit. It's comfortable enough that on a 5-10 mile bike ride I don't notice it on my noggin. I like that I don't even think about it being on my head. 5 stars. This isn't the lightest helmet, and not the most aerodynamic, but it does the job I need it to do, and doesn't look horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: Had to return it
customer_reviews.text: It looks to be very well made. But I had to turn it it was extremely large on my head. I mean the interior fits, but the outer shell is huge. Picture the movie Spaceballs, the character that had the large helmet on his head.
customer_reviews.author: Jay H

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, but this thing is HUMONGOUS
customer_reviews.text: Oh my god, this thing is comically large. if you've seen Spaceballs, it is reminiscent of Rick Moranis' helmet in that movie. It fits perfectly (I got a Medium and my head is about 56 cm around). It's sturdy, comfortable, and the padding is good, but it just looks ridiculous. I am not a self-conscious person, and I am not one to forego wearing a helmet out of mere vanity, but I am returning this thing and ordering a different brand. I wear my girlfriend's helmet sometimes (same style, size, and sturdiness), and it looks normal. I'll just buy one of those.
customer_reviews.author: Ike M.

customer_reviews.title: Worth four times the price!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a huge noggin: 7-3/4 US size. And my head is egg-shaped, not round. Ordered one bike helmet that was round and cheap. Returned it. Bought this one and was amazed at the fit and quality. Fits perfectly!!!! EXTREMELY well made; top quality. VERY impressed and I recommend this helmet whole-heartedly to all.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Card

customer_reviews.title: The color is great, it took reflective strips of tape well
customer_reviews.text: Pros: This helmet is well made and it is really thick. The color is great, it took reflective strips of tape well, and is comfortable to wear. Cons: It is hot. The helmet is so thick that it is impossible to do a little head scratch when you need to and the shape of it means I have to take my hair down to wear it. Also, it has to be positioned perfectly on your head in order to wear sunglasses or the back padding will keep pushing your sunglasses off of your head. It is fine, it just takes some getting used to as it sits flatter on your head than you think.
customer_reviews.author: redstar

customer_reviews.title: Storm Troopers Here I Come!!
customer_reviews.text: Has a storm trooper's helmet appearance and quality of construction is well above the price point. Light, well ventilated and balanced. Contrary to other's stating this helmet runs "small", I feel it runs "narrow" instead. I have 59 cm circumference but the temples are "snug" while there is a full centimeter of free play between the front and rear pads. For those with standard profile head, I think following the size chart would be safest bet. But if you have a wide head, buy one size up is a safer alternative. I am using this for tree climbing protection, it also accommodate sun glasses well.
customer_reviews.author: Green eyes in the dark

customer_reviews.title: wood-looking helmet
customer_reviews.text: never wore a bike helmet in my life, but I wouldn't be able to do a triathlon without one, so picked one that would fit my style and allow beer stickers to be placed on it. looks a little dorky, but what bike helmet doesn't. appreciate this one over all the others because it is a little unusual. and tells all the other athletes (as I pass them on my 40 year old Schwinn) that I am not one to be take seriously. haven't had an accident with it yet, but does fit snugly without giving me a headache. comes with some extra padding should you head be a little smaller than the helmet.
customer_reviews.author: richard hodge

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful and well made
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful and well made. My head doesn't get hot while wearing and the large size fit my giant head perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: C. S.

customer_reviews.title: If in doubt, size up
customer_reviews.text: I didn't measure my kid's heads. I looked at other reviews with pictures and guessed. That worked out ok, actually. I got my 8 year old a small, and it fits without the 2 extra inserts. She'll need a new one in 6-12 months, but she'll probably want a new one by then anyway. This seems sturdy, and I like the smooth texture- nothing to "catch" the ground if she falls, causing neck injury.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Z

customer_reviews.title: I call it my "Space Balls" helemet
customer_reviews.text: You know how Rick Moranis' character has the oversized vader helmet? Well that's kinda how I feel wearing it. Don't get me wrong, it's super comfortable and cool looking, but it is an oversized helmet. the foam is nice and I feel safe, but I look like a candy sucker when I see my shadow. I thought about sending it back, but realized because of the comfort and my love for 80s movies, I was keep it. Just be aware...it'll look big on your head.
customer_reviews.author: ERM

customer_reviews.title: When in doubt, size down
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet that I bought to start roller skating. Recommendation: When in doubt, size down. My measurements were right on the cusp between M and L. I get headaches easily so I got the L to keep from squeezing my head. It fits well enough with the included thicker padding, but I could have easily and comfortably gotten a medium for a more secure fit.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Broke it in with a bang
customer_reviews.text: I wore this helmet for the first time over the weekend. It was comfortable and very padded however well ventilated so my head stayed cool. Everything was going fine on our really safe scooter ride when I hit an unexpected bump. I soon went flying off my scooter and face flat onto the ground. I hit my head and my face but thankfully I had this helmet and a face mask covering my face. I heard it hit the ground however I felt nothing more than a slight tap to the head. I was able to walk away with a few scratches on my hands from the fall. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ximena

customer_reviews.title: Splurge!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted a unique bike helmet to go with my new bike. This one is just what I was looking for. There are 2 choices of inner lining, one thicker than the other to make it a tad more adjustable. I still found it to run a tiny bit small. My head size is right at the upper limit for the smaller size, but I wish I had gone up to the larger one. I'm keeping it, tho, because it is still comfortable. The chin strap is easily adjustable and the helmet does not get overly hot.
customer_reviews.author: Marian the Librarian

customer_reviews.title: It’s not the fit, it’s the design!!! Way too big!!!
customer_reviews.text: Way too big, not that I ordered the wrong size, it’s a really big design
customer_reviews.author: SAMO

customer_reviews.title: Provides Proper Police-Proof Pinhead Protection
customer_reviews.text: Shipped on time and packed well. Looks great, it's light, comfortable and surprisingly fits my tiny pinhead (6-7/8-ish) perfectly without the extra foam inserts. I wear a thin baseball cap under it and it's perfect. So far, it's protected me from a low-hanging leafy twig I scootered under, and it also protects me from citations (and publicity stunt photo-ops) by ticket-hungry Santa Monica cops.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: to small and not steadble for me
customer_reviews.text: i buy this for my new staketboard. the size is too small for my head. and the weight is over i expected. when I jump i could feel it unstable. but i like the color. the last one i buy is black, not good looking. this one may save you life. the quality is good. i don't believe is easy to break. but the size is too small. i buy large. if your head is so big than normal, maybe choose other brand. i lover the color, very natural and unusual.
customer_reviews.author: Leo S.

customer_reviews.title: HELMETS ARE SUPPOSED TO BE BIG !
customer_reviews.text: Yes its bigger than my other helmets, But Do you want a big helmet , or a little one when you crash ? I purchased 2 more after this one so we now have 3 Retrospec helmets . My son and my wife each had to have one after they saw mine. I have the wood grain, wife has the eggshell, son has the blue . Stop worrying about what other people are thinking about you, this helmet is THE HELMET!! So light I forget I am wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: JOSIAH DANIELSON

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The matte black is nice but kids throw it down and it gets scratched easily. The foam inside slips a lot so I’m constantly readjusting it. Also, the chin strap doesn’t stay tight all the time so that’s another thing I’m adjusting. We will probably use this for a short time, but I’ll replace it soon. My son fell once and the helmet moved back and he still scratched his forehead. Not very thrilled I have to tighten it constantly. I bought this a month or two ago.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren E Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy with this helmet
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a medium and my head is about 22 inches at forehead. I knew it would be close but it fits perfectly and I like everything about this helmet. It also comes with pads for people with a smaller head. It seems very high quality and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: bassman36

customer_reviews.title: She says it really cool looking and fits nice
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding helmet! Purchased for my daughter. She says it really cool looking and fits nice. She has several other helmets and says this is the best one. Just buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: great product and price, but don't depend on the color
customer_reviews.text: Love the product, fits as expected, looks good, extra padding is a nice touch, but we ordered matte slate and were shipped matte white..... so don't depend on the colors they show ;-) The good news is they paint well so the color wasn't hugely important to us.
customer_reviews.author: K. Seiffert

customer_reviews.title: RUNS SMALL!!!
customer_reviews.text: If your head circumference is close to the high end of the range for a particular size, buy the next size up. I bought a medium size for my 58 cm head. Even after removing all the padding, it was so tight that it gave me a headache after a few minutes. I am returning it and getting a large. The helmet is very nice looking and I think it will be comfortable once I get the right size for me.
customer_reviews.author: Steph G

customer_reviews.title: Bad design model
customer_reviews.text: If you don't want to torture yourself in the endless returns and refunds please don't buy this helmet. Its model is badly designed. It squeezes your temples and with too much space in the front and back. You won't be able to find a suitable size for your head.

customer_reviews.title: Hilariously too large
customer_reviews.text: I measured my head and ordered accordingly. The helmet arrived on time and was hilariously way to big. I was hoping it would be like my Triple Eight helmet as it looked very similar but it was twice the size and I wouldn’t be caught dead wearing this joke. If you want to look like a tik toked touched momo this is the helmet for you. If you want to be safe and still look cool get the Triple Eight helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler N

customer_reviews.title: Strangely narrow
customer_reviews.text: This is a good looking helmet, but it is cut strangely and ended up so uncomfortable (even though it technically fits) that I don't even use this one and end up borrowing one from a family member. It's almost like it's narrow on the top of the head and squeezes, but if I went larger it would be way too big anywhere else even if I used different padding. It's frustrating and I wish I had sent it back. I'm hoping one of my kids eventually grows into it. On the up side, it's super cool looking and appears to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia M.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Cute enough helmet that seems super sturdy. It is nice it has so many pieces of cushion you can use inside but I wish they would Velcro (or something) together. I feel like I’m going to end up losing them, they just lay inside the helmet. Also, on the appearance, it seems like a really tall helmet and makes the head look a little funny BUT since it seems super safe that of course is the most important factor.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: It's not pretty but...
customer_reviews.text: ...it's clearly safe. It's a bit hot, but mostly due to it's heavy weight and sturdiness. My students laugh at me, but it's also clearly visible and protects me on the road. Exactly what I hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Bickel

customer_reviews.title: This Helmet Saved My Life
customer_reviews.text: I had my ebike for whole 2 days before I crashed really bad on it. I was wearing this helmet and had I not been I dont think I would be here right now. I collided with a car and the first and only thing to hit the car was my head. I was also hauling down the street at 25 miles per hour (i have a speedometer). What was really awesome about this is that it didnt even crack or bust, just a couple of scratches, so this thing can take some force.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa29

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money and nice look
customer_reviews.text: The quality seems too notch compared to paying 70+ at a local bike store. I use it for mountain biking. The only negative is it doesn’t necessarily cover much else but your top part of your head. If I ever get more serious about mountain biking I’ll likely have to get a helmet that covers further down on my neck. I bought a large and I have a relatively large head and it fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolai Kousholt Soendergaard

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price with some quirks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this helmet because it offered better protection for the back of the head compared to the normal cycling helmet styles. I use it for cycling but it looks a bit bigger on my head. So its not the most stylish. It isn't too heavy either. However when I try to wear a sunglass with the helmet its hard to get the sunglass to fit right. That is probably my biggest complaint. I probably wouldn't buy another one for cycling for the above reasons but as a helmet which offers protection it does just that job well.
customer_reviews.author: smashingdon

customer_reviews.title: Used or new helmet?
customer_reviews.text: I just got my helmet, was so excited because started to get nicer where I live! And riding bike is really good for me and my daughter. Well o just got it today and i tried it and looks like if it’s being used, has scratches everywhere but in front is the big one which looks bad!. I know it’s white and I know it would probably get scratched as I use it but right now it makes non sense
customer_reviews.author: Raysha

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this 4 stars, only because it looks HUGE on your head. But it is very comfortable and, honestly, safety and comfort are the only two things that matter to me here. It seems very solid and the foam inside is comfortable. The straps are easy to adjust. I have a larger head (24") and often have trouble finding hats that fit. The largest size of this helmet fits me fine.
customer_reviews.author: Halef and Michael

customer_reviews.title: It fits nicely after adjusting the added padding that came with it.
customer_reviews.text: It fits nicely after adjusting the added padding that came with the helmet. It is lightweight and comfortable despite...despite being a bulky helmet. I ordered Large and my head is typically a 7.25. Could have possibly gone with a Medium for a closer fit.
customer_reviews.author: Haywood D. Giles

customer_reviews.title: Be aware— extremely thick shell
customer_reviews.text: Helmet appears to be of great quality, however, the shell is extremely large. Almost double the size of what I would consider to be normal. Honestly, it just made my husband look like he was going to space. Returned simply because it was not the look we were going for. I have no doubt it would have protected him on his bike but because we were only getting a helmet for joy rides/wearing one so that our son would wear one, we’ll get one that’s nicer looking.
customer_reviews.author: HT721

customer_reviews.title: I like my brain
customer_reviews.text: I purchsed this product becuase my 9 yrs old boy started ridding his bike... - so, what's best then to lead as an example... - this hard hat is very light, comfortable, stylish and more importantly, is PROTECTS MY HEAD...
customer_reviews.author: abran paso

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and good fit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a medium based on their size charts, and as soon as I swapped out for the thicker foam piece that was included it fit great. It feels a little heavy compared to my traditional Bell bike helmet, but given there’s more to it I’m not surprised. Seems very thick and sturdy, which makes me confident to get out and enjoy my sports.
customer_reviews.author: Zsa415

customer_reviews.title: This Helmet saved my life!
customer_reviews.text: I was grateful to be wearing this helmet when I was hit by a truck while riding my bike. While I was thrown over 30 feet in the air from the point of impact and landed on the pavement, I suffered no head injuries. There was no doubt from the medical staff that the use of this helmet allowed me to walk away. Buy this helmet, you can trust it to help keep you safe. Buy it and wear it anytime you ride!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey L Thomas

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write product reviews, but could not have been happier with this purchase. The best $25 that I've spent. Excellent quality. Has the look and feel of a really expensive helmet with an extremely reasonable price tag. Perfect snug fit; however, I supposed that part varies with how close your head size is to the helmet size that you order. Comes with a couple of extra inserts for a more snug fit if the helmet is loose.
customer_reviews.author: JTDN

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful helmet and I do not regret it. The design will catch other's attention
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful helmet and I do not regret it. The design will catch other's attention! I purchased this helmet as the helmets at the stores were pretty ugly, and this one was the one I had my eyes on. I do not regret purchasing this helmet. Pros +Follows skating regulations +Beautiful design +Great airflow, your head won't sweat If you are thinking about purchasing this helmet, I'd do it before it is out of stock. This helmet is great for skating, biking, or any dangerous outside activity. 10 stars/10 stars
customer_reviews.author: Luanna

customer_reviews.title: It's great, but holy bobblehead!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and knew this is a thick helmet, but I just bought a great, inexpensive Retrospec bike to ride to the beach, and I liked the idea of an inexpensive matching helmet. The helmet seems well constructed and is of great quality, but it is definitely thick! I haven't worn it to the beach yet. If it really bugs me I'll donate it and search for a thinner one.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Give credit, where credit is due
customer_reviews.text: I walked into the garage to discover a cracked helmet. I asked my son what happened. He causally tells me he crashed into a tree. No head or bodily damage. Boys will be boys I suppose. Thanks for making a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Asuncion

customer_reviews.title: Great price, works great!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my neice great. Made well and very sturdy. Keep in mind DOC says the foam "expires" every 5 years so shouldnt be used longer than that. This is a great price and all the skater kids want matt black anyway so works great. Buy them a "sticker pack" here on Amazon and let them plaster the helmet for $5, a great look!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Lutz

customer_reviews.title: it's a helmet
customer_reviews.text: I recently started riding a beach cruiser every day around my town and this actually the first bicycle helmet I've ever purchased so I didn't have any expectations. I ordered a L as I have a giant head and by swapping around the included liner pieces I was able to get a perfect fit. The helmet itself is light and comfortable, the vents allow plenty of airflow. I don't think it is the smallest solution, but it is light and comfortable and a god value for the $.
customer_reviews.author: grumpy_ken

customer_reviews.title: worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this helmet because I started more changing bike trails and today my bike when one direction and I went another. I landed hard and my head smacked the ground solidly. With this Helmet all was good and I could tell the force of the impact was mostly adsorbed by the helmet and the force was spreed out around my head without any ill effect. This one event makes this helmet a great buy. If you like to bike and want to protect your noggin then this helmet is worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: A Lipp

customer_reviews.title: I thought it was too small
customer_reviews.text: Its shaped a little more oval than round. I originally thought it was too small since the sides of my head felt a little pinched, but a friend of mine use to fit helmets and told me it fit fine if not a little big front to back. It still fits well enough to be safe, but keep that in mind if you have a very round head.
customer_reviews.author: Tira

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work fine.
customer_reviews.text: Went headfirst into the sidewalk after swerving into it going down a road. Was kinda fun having my head skidded along the sidewalk since there were no injuries except a scraped knee, no damage except a few embedded pebbles. Took some time to adjust just right but from what I read it's supposed to be that way. I ended up taking out all but the top fitting pad because my head is fat. tl;dr works fine for head impacts, make sure to get the right size and spend time adjusting, safety equipment is no good if worn improperly or too uncomfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet
customer_reviews.text: Helmet is sturdy and looks good on. I ordered the green and received a coral color instead but I decided it might be the universe telling me to wear a brightly colored helmet that stands out instead of one that blends in with the trees so I am keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: Corrine

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: Ended up returning the size I bought by measurement for 1 size up. My daughter is new to skateboarding over covid and wanted her protected. She's fallen twice and I believe this helmet has and will save us trips to the er. Padding is great and company was easy to work with theough amazon for exchange. No issues
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a helmet that has great visibility and has a unique appeal. The price was great on these Critical helmets so I picked a bamboo pattern one. The straps are fairly easy to adjust and the foam core is thick. I have used these for two months now twice a week and feel these will hold up a while.
customer_reviews.author: N. Sun

customer_reviews.title: Who dropped the ball??
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but medium was received instead of the large I ordered. Tried to return for exchange, but they wanted to send the same medium size!? Realistic wood grain pattern is phenomenal looking, seems quite well made. BUT you can't fit 25lbs in a 12lb bag! I just would like to exchange for the large I ordered...
customer_reviews.author: David Proctor

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Really love this helmet, I feel more secure with this helmet compared to my other retrospec helmet which was more of a race helmet. I didn’t feel like it would protect my head that much. But I love this helmet the style and I feel protected and after reading all the reviews I made the right choice.
customer_reviews.author: ebony

customer_reviews.title: Junior sized only.
customer_reviews.text: My return went perfectly well. It was my error to think that I could wear a small helmet. But the wooden effect look just caught my eye and I gave it a shot. Nice helmet indeed but only sold in the small size for this wooden style finish. Can there be some mediums or larges available one day?
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Pfeffer

customer_reviews.title: Decent helmet
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a nice helmet, tho I haven't put it to the test yet. Just fits my large head. One of the clips that connect the straps tends to pull free from the strap if I'm not careful because for my size there isn't much extra strap, but until I get around to sewing it, it's not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect in every way! Yay!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love it. Perfect fit, snug, not tight. Super light, but feels very secure and protective. Get compliments when wearing it --"really like your 'sandstone' helmet!" Well it's meant to be "pine", but who cares. Looks lovely and won't show scratches if it ever gets dropped by clumsy me.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Jaynes

customer_reviews.title: Don’t order if you have a long face
customer_reviews.text: It looks ugly on your head sitting way high. While this is not the main criteria for helmets, if I’m riding and thinking that I look like an egg-head, I’ll be more prone to distracted accidents and then I’ll test it’s true purpose. Right now I just really dislike it for the looks.
customer_reviews.author: Kyryll

customer_reviews.title: I like this helmet
customer_reviews.text: I like this helmet. Bike helmets that designed to be sleek and aerodynamic look ridiculous--after all, I'm not riding in the Tour De France. I'm just trying to save my dome from when I fall off my bike avoiding squirrels and terrible drivers.
customer_reviews.author: kgatch

customer_reviews.title: Recommended in Orange
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this helmet. It is approved for safety and I think the orange stands out as an extra level of safety since I ride to work everyday in Philadelphia with lots of city traffic. So far it isn’t tested in a crash and I hope never will. Very good value for money. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: jordan.z.g

customer_reviews.title: Lacks any adjustment, too chunky
customer_reviews.text: I did not like it at all. The size should be correct, but it felt jammed between the ears, no fine adjustments of any kind for the head, only chin. OutdoorMaster Skateboard Helmet feels like a luxury item with multi point adjustments, yet cost only 1 cent more.
customer_reviews.author: bluelight

customer_reviews.title: Nice Helmet but Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a medium the first time, but had to exchange it for a large. The stated measurements seem to be off. I am a 5’4” woman. I doubt that this helmet would fit a larger person. That said, I ordered the matte orange to match my bike and I love the color.
customer_reviews.author: CincyCouple2

customer_reviews.title: Ok-ish
customer_reviews.text: Great color, nice construction, super disappointed in the helmet showing up damaged and scraped though. We waited so long for it to arrive just for it to be damaged :( Also its a bit narrow for our kiddo who has a very wide head. Not the co’s fault, just a downside for kiddo.
customer_reviews.author: Rach L

customer_reviews.title: Tested works great
customer_reviews.text: Im in the hospital at the moment from electric skateboard accident. I just wanted to thank this helmet maker for saving my head. I totally wouldn't be writing this had I not been wearing it. It's comfortable, pretty breathable, looks funny (I bought the wood grain one), and first hand tested that it works. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Licemeat

customer_reviews.title: Great value but very bulky
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for! This helmet is much larger/bulkier than its $150+ peers, so I wouldn't buy it if you're trying to impress your friends, but it fits my head great and upon inspection it appears very sturdy and looks like it will protect me really well if it ever comes to that. I feel like for the price, this was a really fair product.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: This helmet is gigantic!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness! This helmet was HUGE! It looked insanely large on my head. I cracked up laughing when I tried it on. I will say that the product is well and would certainly offer protection. I just couldn’t get over the massive size and returned the item.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary

customer_reviews.title: Great color and style
customer_reviews.text: I bought this helmet to match the style of my beach cruiser, and it is perfect. The eggshell coloring and tan hue really match my wicker accents and accessories. The helmet itself is comfortable. Make sure you check the sizing for a safe fit.
customer_reviews.author: ANette 637

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo look is great, the helmet itself as well.
customer_reviews.text: Really like the look of this helmet. Of course it’s not made with real bamboo, but it looks very real. It is smooth matte to the touch and fits nicely. It comes with a spare strip of foam and my kids say it is comfortable. We also got a white one. The bamboo is definitely more distinctive and unique, otherwise they are identical.
customer_reviews.author: Amnon G

customer_reviews.title: Blueish Gray Color Way Off (but still great!)
customer_reviews.text: The slate blueish gray color is a lot lighter than shown (but I actually ended up liking the color even more). It’s much more of a super light gray with a faint dusty blue tint. Other than that, it fits great! It’s obviously kind of sketchy ordering a helmet online since you never know your size with each helmet, but I estimated with a medium and it was a tiny bit too big, but the extra padding that you can put in made it perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlan

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike/scooter helmet!
customer_reviews.text: I use it most every day, and it is comfortable and easy to put on and take off. Have not crashed with it, but it seems sturdy and can probably save your head in an accident. Not to mention a lot of people seem to think it looks really cool!
customer_reviews.author: Beate

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I did alot of research prior to choosing a helmet for my 11 yr old kid. This is one of the top rated helmets. It's a great deal if you can get one that isnt sold out. Worth the wait though. Not the color we wanted but it's what came back in stock. She just graffitied it.
customer_reviews.author: Chelcea

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet!
customer_reviews.text: Love this helmet. Most hurt my head as I have nerve damage in my head, but this one is very comfortable and fits great! I don't feel as though it's overly heavy on my head either and the straps allow me to wear my earbuds without issue...I had problems with other helmet straps getting in the way and pulling at them.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee L.

customer_reviews.title: Not good for skinny-skulls like mine, got a Giro Quarter instead.
customer_reviews.text: I have a oblong dome that is skinner up front and found that this helmet was way too roomy around my temples. I ended up buying a Quarter (MIPS) from Giro, and it fits me like a glove. If you want to get a similar style helmet that is frankly just designed better, go for a Giro Quarter. Also, the blue was much paler than shown in this picture.
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt Buckingham

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for casual rides
customer_reviews.text: I think for the money it is a great value. I would not wear this helmet if you're going fast or in a riskier environment where you want a helmet to save your life. If you are a casual and safe rider, then this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: RyRy

customer_reviews.title: Size up, weird marks on top of helmet
customer_reviews.text: I would go larger if you’re not sure about sizing. When I measured my head it was around 22.75-23” but the size medium was too small. The large seems fine with both pad inserts! Also, there was weird markings on the helmet when it arrived, that I assume most likely occurred during packaging at the plant
customer_reviews.author: Laur

customer_reviews.title: THis thing is huge.
customer_reviews.text: This is the largest object ive ever put on top of my head. and its heavier than i would have thought. basically just wasted money because there really isnt any valid reason for me to return it besides its like balancing a box rocks on top of a weak neck due to the crushing weight of this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Aramis M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit with plenty of ventilation
customer_reviews.text: I like a nice clean simple look and snug but comfortable fit. Good protection in back of head too. Better than a bike helmet for scooting or an ebike that goes faster than a regular bicycle. Great value for money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Whimscycle

customer_reviews.title: This is a great and solid helmet
customer_reviews.text: This is a great and solid helmet. I bought the small according to the size measurements and my head was at the greater end. It JUST fits. I don't use the additional felts because then I wouldn't be able to get it on my head. I kind of wish I'd have bought the medium for this reason, but I suppose it's just something to get used to. It is definitely snug but not too tight. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet.
customer_reviews.text: Looks so frikkin cool. I got the large so it fits fine and is nicely padded. The real appealing feature is the super nice wood look. I love it have only used it in my garage rink but it is certain to look awesome in the street.
customer_reviews.author: Wyk

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: this is our second helmet, from the first we have grown. It is convenient, beautiful and safe. It is a great choice for children
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: totally worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I have used it for a year already and its pretty good, a little heavy but not too much , 100% sure it will keep your head safe. :)
customer_reviews.author: Diego1212

customer_reviews.title: Go in person
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy but doesn’t fit. I had to take out all pf the foam padding to make this helmet fit. My head is 23 for measurement reference, and with that, it just sat on top of my head, no proper protection. I went to a bike shop for a better fitting helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri

customer_reviews.title: A little confused by the brand...
customer_reviews.text: Thought I bought a Retrospec helmet. It came and is a Critical helmet. They look the same, but my order even had the name Retrospec at the beginning of the description. Seems like a nice helmet. A little bulbous looking on my head-but seems good. I bought the blue because I thought that it would be more comfortable than the black (which I really wanted) in the heat. It's like a robin's egg blue! My husband thought it looked like a kid's color-but oh well! I wish I had purchased the black one. If you are wavering...go for the black.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Paint scratches so easily
customer_reviews.text: Fits a little weird, like it pinches in spots I wouldn't expect but it's ok for a commuter helmet. I've had it for about a year now and it is holding up well except for the finish - it is COVERED in scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin D

customer_reviews.title: Layered inserts
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for nine-year-olds said it was for adults but it actually comes with different inserts to fit the head so she can grow into it haven't tried it out writing but fit her well had to take one layer out to fit her head
customer_reviews.author: Effie M.

customer_reviews.title: It looks huge, once it's on
customer_reviews.text: Looks way too big, the shape of helmet makes it look comical if you have a big head to begin with. The fit was good and it does look sturdy just didn't like how it looked on me. I went with Pro Tec helmet instead.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, light, and fits well.
customer_reviews.text: I actually like wearing this helmet. I wear this on my moped, even though it is not a DOT helmet. It's better than nothing. Considering the low price, I rate it five stars all around. If I crash, I may or may not update this review. XD
customer_reviews.author: NAC

product_meta.title: Retrospec CM-1 Classic Commuter Bike/Skate/Multi-Sport Helmet with 10 Vents
product_meta.description: Retrospec CM-1 helmet has arrived and is ready to keep you safe. The classic skate design complements its ultimate head protection. Our helmets are US CPSC certified for virtually all of your action sport shenanigans. Hard and fully formed ABS surrounds high quality EPS foam to absorb shock on impact and keep you safe. Six rectangular vents on top facilitate thorough ventilation throughout your helmet. Cool, fresh air rushes in and pushes out stuffy, stagnant air to keep you cool, dry, and comfortable. Our ultralight CM-1 helmet also comes with 2 sets of inner pads that vary in thickness for you to customize your fit and optimize your comfort.
feature_bullets: Tested and approved for Bike, Skate, Ski. CPSC 16 CFR Part 1203, STM F2040-11 / ASTM F1446, EN 1077, EN 1078
Classic skate design helmet with 8 vents to keep you cool and comfortable and 2 sets of interchangeable pads for a custom fit.
Fully formed ABS surrounds high quality EPS foam to ensure safety on impact. Dry and irritation-free
Keep your head protected in this Retrospec helmet as you ride on your bikes, Skateboards, roller skates and scooters
Pick from a variety of matte Colors to perfectly accent your bike and augment your personality and this helmet is recommended for riders who are age 14+.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
